document.full_text: n.h.l. general managers who favor a full ban on checks to the head said there was some optimism that the managers as a group would continue to accept change.
document.title: n.h.l. moving in right direction on hits to head, some g.m.'s say
lines_and_colors: n.h.l. general managers who favor a full ban on checks to the head said there was some optimism that the managers as a group would continue to accept change.
